summary: The Veterans Skilled Trades Transition Act directs the Secretary of Defense to report to Congress on the effectiveness of programs helping veterans transition their military-acquired skills and credentials into civilian employment. The report, developed in consultation with the Secretaries of Veterans Affairs and Labor, will assess the number of successful credential transfers, identify commonly used certifications, and evaluate barriers veterans face in gaining state certifications. The bill aims to improve the transition process for veterans entering the civilian workforce.
